title: What happened to demotions?
body: I got demoted after only 1 game at 0 LP. I was gaining 20-25 LP per game @ Plat II and only losing 10 for a loss so my MMR is fine. Why the hell did I just get demoted after only 1 game at 0 LP? Considering it wasn't even me at fault for losing, how is AT ALL this justified?

replies.body: nvm, 2 days later I'm back in Plat II no thanks to sh*t matchmaking and Riot demoting me after 1 loss in the first place
